headline: Dupixent® (dupilumab) Approved as the First-ever Biologic Medicine in Japan for Patients with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
summary: Following recent approvals in the EU, China and the U.S., this approval was based on pivotal Phase 3 results in adults with elevated eosinophils Approval marks the first new treatment approach for COPD in more than a decade in Japan and the sixth approved indication for chronic diseases with underlying type 2 inflammation TARRYTOWN, N.Y. and PARIS, March 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: REGN) and Sanofi today announced that the Ministry of Health, Labour and
